title: Atma darishanam
sahitya:
Atma darishanam sheivOmE paramAnanda jIvanam eivOmE vArIr


anupallavi

  pUtta kAlaiyin mukhap-punnakai pOlavE punitamAgap-poliyum pon uLLattAlE param-


caraNam    iru vikArattai venra oru manat-tirattinAl yamanukkum anjAda sama siddhattinAl
aruNa jyOtiyap-pOlE anbarin uLLattil aduvAi ezhundoLirum podu naDap-poruLAna
